@Baruda yeah my thoughts exactly was so confused at what was happening here so had to use some google translation. From my understanding the woman who comes is a babysitter, something to note is that she is very big. Then she comes in and for some reason the grandfather who is apparently very small has decided to masquerade as the baby she should look after. Then he goes on to do pretty much exploit her belief that he's a baby and eventually rape her. While their having sex she wants him deeper inside cause his dick is to small for her large body and eventually he get's sucked into her then she faints. Wakes up confused how she got dressed in her pajamas and finds that the baby is fine and looking normal so she thinks it was all a dream or something. Then were told in the last picture by the parents who hired the babysitter that the grandad should be happy they got home in time to save him or he'd be dead then he just say's something like I was just playing a prank on the babysitter.
